heros.name: Batman
heros.description: The Dark Knight of Gotham, Batman fights crime using his intellect, detective skills, and advanced technology. A symbol of justice, he battles his inner demons while protecting the city from various threats.

heros.name: Superman
heros.description: An alien from Krypton, Superman possesses incredible strength, speed, and the ability to fly. As a champion of truth and justice, he fights for peace and protects the world from powerful foes.

heros.name: Flash
heros.description: Known for his super-speed, Flash can move, think, and react at light speed. He uses his abilities to protect Central City and its inhabitants from threats, proving that every second counts.

heros.name: Green Lantern
heros.description: Armed with a powerful ring that grants him the ability to create anything he can imagine, Green Lantern defends the universe as a member of the Green Lantern Corps, upholding intergalactic peace and justice.

villans.name: Joker
villans.description: The Clown Prince of Crime, Joker is Batman's arch-nemesis. With a twisted sense of humor and a penchant for chaos, he delights in sowing discord and testing the limits of Batman's morality.

villans.name: Penguin
villans.description: A cunning and sophisticated crime lord, Penguin uses his charm and intellect to control Gotham’s underworld. He’s known for his love of birds and elaborate schemes to undermine Batman.

villans.name: Lex Luthor
villans.description: A brilliant businessman and scientist, Lex Luthor sees Superman as a threat to humanity. With his genius intellect and vast resources, he plots to defeat the Man of Steel and prove his superiority.

villans.name: Harley Quinn
villans.description: Once a psychiatrist, Harley Quinn fell in love with the Joker and became his mischievous partner in crime. With her playful yet dangerous nature, she adds chaos to Gotham's criminal landscape.
